Contributing to Log4r
 
If you wish to contribute something to Log4r or assist in development, please drop an email to Leon: leon(at)ugcs dot caltech dot edu. There will always be work to do. Some things that come to mind are:

  • Find bugs and flaws, or areas to improve
  • More Outputters that do various nifty things
  • More and better documentation
  • And, of course, spreading the good word ;-)
